items.content_html: A lightweight and flexible routing solution. Router simplifies the process of implementing client-side routing in React applications, making it easier to manage different views and navigate between them while maintaining a component-based approach.

items.content_html: DBTop Monitoring is lightweight application to perform realtime monitoring for AWS Database Resources. Based on same simplicity concept of Unix top utility, provide quick and fast view of database performance, just all in one screen.

items.content_html: Lightweight library inspired by the Flutter framework (html.js), the Angular framework (renderer.js, css.js) and the JQuery Library (utils.js, prototype.js) which includes a set of utilities and prototypes to prevent losses of production time and to help the developers write fewer lines of code.
